title: Takeshi Nakashima
text:
is a former <a href="Japan">Japan</a>ese <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player.
Playing career.
Nakashima was born in <a href="Hirado%2C%20Nagasaki">Hirado</a> on January 15, 1976. After dropped out from <a href="Waseda%20University">Waseda University</a>, he joined <a href="Urawa%20Reds">Urawa Reds</a> in September 1994. On October, 26, he debuted as left side midfielder and scored a goal against <a href="Nagoya%20Grampus">Nagoya Grampus Eight</a>. After the debut, he played all matches in 1994 season. However he could hardly play in the match from 1995 season, he moved to <a href="Avispa%20Fukuoka">Avispa Fukuoka</a> in 1997. However he could not play at all in the match and retired end of 1997 season.
